title: Mediterranean Spaghetti
description: Spaghetti noodles with seafood, a lot of cherry tomato and spices. Warning: Contains shrimp and other seafood!

title: Signature Pasta
description: Fettuccine pasta with filet mignon cubes, herbs and spices.

title: Fettuccine chilli
description: Fettuccine pasta with chili sauce and spices.

title: Signature Salad with Grilled Salmon
description: Organic salad (lettuce, rocket and carrots) with salmon (180g)

title: Steak with Fries
description: Bife de boi (150g) na chapa, com batatas fritas. Acompanha arroz e molhos.

title: Chopped rumped steak with vegetables and pasta
description: 400g steak with grilled vegetables and pasta chosen by the customer.

title: Vegan Lasagna (Soy Protein)
description: 100% vegan lasagna made with soy meat and special pasta.

title: Special Salad
description: Salad with avocado, mango, lettuce, chickpeas and more.

title: Meatballs
description: Portion of meatballs with sour cream, onion and seasonings. Served with rice or pasta.
